summary: Buried grudges have disasterous consequences for a class reunion in this unapologetically bloody film from Korean director Dae-wung Lim.
cast: Seong-won Jang|Eung-soo Kim|Yeong-Seon Kim|Dong-kyu Lee|Ji-hyeon Lee|Mi-hee Oh|Hyo-jun Park|Yeong-hie Seo|Hyeon-Soo Yeo|Seol-ah Yu
title: Examen final
